description: Tests map node iterating over array items in parallel. The workflow processes each item by doubling its value.
query: Please use the MapIterationWorkflow to process these items: [{'id': 'A', 'value': 10}, {'id': 'B', 'value': 20}, {'id': 'C', 'value': 30}], and render the output file.

evaluation.expected_response: The MapIterationWorkflow has successfully processed the items. The workflow processed 3 items in parallel, doubling each value. Results: Item A: 10 → 20, Item B: 20 → 40, Item C: 30 → 60
evaluation.criterion: Evaluate if the orchestrator successfully delegated to MapIterationWorkflow, and the workflow correctly processed each item in the array using map node, doubling values (A:10→20, B:20→40, C:30→60) and aggregating results.
